mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHARELOT2 (sl_num, u_id, sl_title, sl_content, sl_time, sl_price, sl_regdate, sl_hits, sl_people, sl_addfee) VALUES (SHARELOT_NO_SEQ.nextval, 'ckswhd1128', #{sl_title}, #{sl_content},'공유 시간', '공유 가격', '등록일', '조회수', '제한 인원수', '추가요금')
mapper.select: Select sl_num, u_id, sl_title, sl_content, sl_time, sl_price, sl_regdate, sl_hits, sl_people, sl_addfee FROM sharelot2

SELECT i.priimg_num priimg_num, i.priimg_path priimg_path, i.priimg_name priimg_name, p.pri_num pri_num, p.pri_title pri_title, p.pri_addr pri_addr, b.b_id b_id, b.u_id u_id, b.b_date b_date FROM privatelot P , booklot b, privateimage i WHERE b.U_ID = 'ckswhd1128' and p.pri_num = b.pri_num and i.PRI_NUM = p.pri_num
